creator: Droidbee
descriptionHtml:
Revolutionary sales tracking point of sale (POS) app with many features.

Features

Inventory Management
Maintain inventory with item photos and details like purchase price, sales price, category, brand etc

Multi Currency Support
Support for USD, Euro, Pound, Saudi Royal, Indian Rupee, Krone, Chinese Yuan, and more

Discounts
Apply discounts to individual items in sale receipts, and also to overall bill

Refund item
Item can be refunded and it will be added back to inventory

Sales charts
See how your sales are going. Last 7 days sales graph shown to better visualize your sales

Purchase order
Add purchase orders and inventory is automatically updated on order complete. Installment option also possible in purchase orders

Multi level items
Provision to add subitems to items (to create sets). Set as well as individual items can be sold as a set or individual items

Installment module
Sell now and get payments later. Very versatile installment plans can be made.

Payment reminders
Get reminders for customers who have not paid installments since a given time

Expense tracker
Track expenses like bills, salaries, maintenance etc

Barcode/QR reading ability
Scan items by barcode/QR code to make invoices and to add items in inventory

Receipt Printing
You can print invoices

Supports Online and Offline mode
No worries if you are out of network coverage. Just use the app as if you are online. When coverage will restore, app will automatically sync.

Customer info
Add details of customers

Customer sales tracking
Track sales of each customer, also track due amount

Vendor purchase tracking

Cashier account
Create separate account for cashier with limited access

Special features for Jewellery shops

... and much more.

So what are you waiting for?
Give it a try. Igloo POS has FREE trial for 3 months!!

All of this stuff with simple and easy to use interface.

3 months beta (extendable)
descriptionShort: Simple point of sale (POS) system. Built for non accountants and easy to use

title: Igloo POS - Point of Sale, Inventory and Invoices

creator: Droidbee
descriptionHtml:
Looking for a perfect Point of sale (POS) solution for your e-commerce business or other work? Install Igloo POS - Point of Sale, Inventory, and Invoices app on your android device and replace your traditional cash book with it.

With this simple yet elegant POS system app, keep a record of your transaction easily with one tap. Whether you are doing managerial work, a restaurant business, e-commerce, or online business, our POS application has every feature for everyone.

Using this POS inventory app, track sales and keep inventory in real-time. Invoice management with this POS point of sale app is also easy and quick.

Take a look at the key features of the POS billing software app:



Igloo POS - Point of Sale, Inventory, and Invoices app has many features for your business or daily work.

Inventory Management

Maintain inventory with item photos and details like purchase price, sales price, category, brand etc. You won’t lose your ledger book again. This digital store inventory app will keep a record of every product.

Multi Currency Support
This ledger account book personal app support multi-currencies, including USD, Euro, Pound, Saudi Royal, Indian Rupee, Krone, Chinese Yuan, and more. 

Discounts
While generating a sale receipt, you can apply discounts to individual items in it. Also, add discounts on the overall bill using this account book-point of sale app. You can add refunded items back to the inventory with this inventory tracker app.

Sales charts
Keep track and see your sales record. Monthly and weekly sales charts are available in this inventory management app, and you can see weekly sales graphs to better visualize your sales.

Purchase order & Installment
Add purchase orders and inventory is automatically updated on order completion. An installment option is also possible in purchase orders.

 Multi-Level Items
Add sub-items to items (to create sets) in our ledger book app. You can add a set of items or individual items as per your need.

Installment module & Expense Tracker
Create a versatile installment plan with this POS account book. And also get reminders about customers who have not paid installments yet. Track expenses like bills, salaries, maintenance etc quickly and flawlessly.

Barcode/QR Reader
Scan items by barcode/QR code to make invoices and to add items in inventory. Invoice inventory is available, and you can print invoices through wireless printers.

Online and Offline Mode
Use this POS billing app online as well as offline. If using offline, the info will be automatically synced when online.

Customer Sales Tracking
Track sales of each customer, also track due amount. Add details of customers, and see invoices based on each customer. Vendor purchase tracking is also available. You can also create a separate account for cashier with limited access.

POS mobile app comes with all possible features that you can use. Our app also has special features for Jewelry shops. And if you are looking for a point of sale app to give a free trial, use our POS app free. After one month of a FREE trial, you can purchase it access all the features.

Install Igloo POS - Point of Sale, Inventory and Invoices, keep track of your sales, invoices, inventories, and more and make life easier!

Even on FREE plan you can still add unlimited items and receipts.
descriptionShort: POS point of sale- Ledger account book, inventory management, invoice management

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Web link added to open app in browser, you can now use Igloo POS from you laptop!

Sales charts
Keep track and see your sales record. Monthly and weekly sales charts are available in this inventory management app, and you can see weekly sales graphs to better visualize your sales.

Purchase order & Installment
Add purchase orders and inventory is automatically updated on order completion. An installment option is also possible in purchase orders.

 Multi-Level Items
Add sub-items to items (to create sets) in our ledger book app. You can add a set of items or individual items as per your need.

Installment module & Expense Tracker
Create a versatile installment plan with this POS account book. And also get reminders about customers who have not paid installments yet. Track expenses like bills, salaries, maintenance etc quickly and flawlessly.

Barcode/QR Reader
Scan items by barcode/QR code to make invoices and to add items in inventory. Invoice inventory is available, and you can print invoices through wireless printers.

Online and Offline Mode
Use this POS billing app online as well as offline. If using offline, the info will be automatically synced when online.

Customer Sales Tracking
Track sales of each customer, also track due amount. Add details of customers, and see invoices based on each customer. Vendor purchase tracking is also available. You can also create a separate account for cashier with limited access.

POS mobile app comes with all possible features that you can use. Our app also has special features for Jewelry shops. And if you are looking for a point of sale app to give a free trial, use our POS app free. After one month of a FREE trial, you can purchase it access all the features.

Install Igloo POS - Point of Sale, Inventory and Invoices, keep track of your sales, invoices, inventories, and more and make life easier!

Even on FREE plan you can still add unlimited items and receipts.
